column2: Collaborating with senior leaders on internal and external-facing materials. An excellent communicator who is respected for their judgment, work ethic and performance.      Ability to express and share a vision and inspire others to action.      Highly effective with using data and storytelling to communicate a vision and a strategy. column2: The ET Editor Strategic Initiatives will be responsible for content production and management of new initiatives, new sections, branded content, including advertorials, videos, long-form content, reports, contributor articles, and social media content, among others, on EconomicTimes com      And, very critical drives direction of content for new audiences - creating content for new hitherto unreported verticals of reader and advertiser interest      Works closely with the newsroom to ensure close collaboration      The ET Editor Strategic Initiatives leads the team that ideates and creates compelling branded content that meets the best-in-class content standards and fulfills the objectives of brands and clients across various industries and globally      The ET Editor Strategic Initiatives team will collaborate with multiple stakeholders to ensure the flawless execution and delivery of content deliverables across branded content, events, data-driven reports, news products such as surveys, indexes, ebooks, whitepapers, and other related content initiatives      This will involve owning the production of content from ideation to production to distribution by ideating and pitching engagement ideas based on client briefs as well as writing, storytelling, and editing content for various articles, videos, social media, websites, events, and other related multimedia formats            Responsibilities:      Lead a team of writers, designers, guest relations resources and manages brand content across ET in different formats such as advertorials, native articles, event-related content, newsletters, social media and events.      Meet content quality standards and deadlines on all content deliverables, and provide relevant feedback and suggestions, where necessary, on content created by clients      Own the content creation process from kick-off until wrap-up of various campaigns, including interpreting and understanding client objectives, recommending relevant themes and ideas, managing content assignments and timelines by creating, editing, and scheduling content, identifying opportunities for optimization to meet KPIs, and incorporating best practices and learnings in future campaigns and initiatives doing all this, through effective collaboration with the branded content team and multiple internal stakeholders      Work on production of in-depth research reports and ebooks on various topics liaising effectively with internal and external stakeholders as necessary in the final delivery of key findings and dissemination of report      Assist in the planning and production of content for ET events and IPs before, during and post the completion of the event while ensuring the successful execution of all client content deliverables      Liaise with internal stakeholders on various ongoing campaigns as well as new opportunities and effectively articulate content ideas and approaches recommended in pitches      Manage workflow and assignments on project management tools and internal trackers to ensure the effective end-to-end execution and timely delivery of content assignments      Own the execution of content products and deliverables for select verticals and/or news products, including prioritizing the alignment of storytelling with business priorities      Provide effective pre-sales support with ideation, themes, and research to craft multi-touchpoint branded content proposals and pitches for related business opportunities      Ensure effective collaboration with multiple stakeholders in crafting the right content strategy and pitch for new and existing content IPs, including recommending themes, speakers, sessions, formats, and engagement avenues that stay true to ET s quality standards while meeting client objectives and commitments      On occasion, moderates webcasts or panels at events - video and audio      Skills and Experience:      Upto 15 years of experience in writing, editing, content strategy, and content creation at a media company and/or a creative agency      Experience in branded content strategy and execution, with a focus on custom campaigns, advertiser-funded programs, in-house IPs, and content products      Passionate about brand storytelling, a keen follower of industry trends and innovations, and an innate understanding of content strategies and formats to engage online audiences      Ability to balance multiple priorities and work in a fast-paced environment, doing so while ensuring quality standards and meeting deadlines      Strong background in digital and SEO and good familiarity with social media tools such as Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn, among others      Effective project management and team leadership skills, with the ability to mentor and guide team members and collaborate proactively with peers      Strong accountability,and a problem-solver who is detail-oriented and has a demonstrated ability to manage and successfully execute a project from start to finish      Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with experience in multimedia production including data visualization, video      Designing and curating thought leadership events

column1: Tech Arch Associate Manager - Learning and Collaboration
column2: Skill required:Learning Content Design and Development - Learning Content Development  Designation:Management Level - Associate Manager  Job Location:Bengaluru  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:10 to 14 years  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Learning and Collaboration vertical and help us in dealing with the end to end Learning and Development activities. You will be working as a part of Learning Content Design & Development team which is responsible for the creation, curation and deployment of various training modules across Accenture. The Learning Content Development team focuses on developing learning activities and supporting materials (for instructor-led training, web-based training, application simulations and performance simulation) according to the content design plan. The team is responsible for creating content for e-learning modules, developing training solutions using prescribed tools, quality, budget and milestone standards. The team is also responsible for participating in course test activities such as cycle testing, UAT, editorial and instructional design checks to properly document problems for issue resolution.  What are we looking for? Adaptable and flexible  Ability to perform under pressure  Problem-solving skills  Detail orientation  Ability to establish strong client relationship Roles and Responsibilities  In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of moderately complex problems  Typically creates new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures  The person requires understanding of the strategic direction set by senior management as it relates to team goals  Primary upward interaction is with direct supervisor or team leads  Generally interacts with peers and/or management levels at a client and/or within Accenture  The person should require minimal guidance when determining methods and procedures on new assignments  Decisions often impact the team in which they reside and occasionally impact other teams  Individual would manage medium-small sized teams and/or work efforts (if in an individual contributor role) at a client or within Accenture  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts
column11: content designing, training, content development, technical architecture, content writing, digital marketing, content editing, content management, instructional design, proof reading, editing, creative writing, e-learning, social media marketing

column2: The role will own & lead content ideation, material research, and writing across all distribution channels including Website, Blogs, Social Media, Email, Whatsapp, etc. ensuring that it accurately explains our investment offerings and also aligns with our brand's voice, values, and goals. The person will work closely with his/her manager along with other folks such as Growth Investment Manager, content writers, editors and other marketing team members both internally and externally like freelancers/agencies. Additionally, this person will also work closely with Investments & Leadership Team on some of the content topics. Responsibilities: - Establish a strong understanding of investment product offerings - Ideate, develop and execute content strategy across all distribution platforms - Make sure all content is accurate, presented well for easier consumption, SEO optimized, and aligns with our brand standards - Create differentiated content aligned with the distribution platforms whether it is videos, blogs, email, website, posters, etc. - Collaborate, develop and manage a content calendar that encompasses all business needs - Managing a team of interna/external writers, editors, and content creators, providing feedback and coaching as needed - Track performance (feedback/engagement metrics) on how the content has been received, and optimized regularly - Be updated on new market changes, industry trends, regulation and economic factors, and incorporate happenings into the content strategy Requirements: - 10+ years of experience in content marketing, with at least 5 years in investment related content space - Finance domain knowledge is mandatory related to investment asset classes, personal finance, investment portfolio, risk return tradeoffs, economic factors, etc.  - Proven ability to research and create simple engaging stories on complex subjects that is easier to understand for customers - Proven track record of being very creative, and leading content strategy across distribution channels - Strong leadership skills, with the ability to motivate and manage a team of writers/editors - Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams - Good understanding of SEO and content marketing best practices - Strong analytical skills to track performance and leads via data driven decision making
column11: Content, content marketing, Content Management, Content Development, Content Writing
